heroesgrave.paint.gui

Class SimpleModalProgressDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • heroesgrave.paint.gui.SimpleModalProgressDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SimpleModalProgressDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A simple, modal, Progress-Dialog, that is tied to the applications main-frame.
    Usage: 
     SimpleModalProgressDialog dialog = new SimpleModalProgressDialog(...);
 
 ... do stuff, and call setText, setValue to tell the user that something is going on ...
 
 dialog.close();
    It is THAT simple!

    Author:
    Longor1996

        public void setValue(int value)
        Sets the value of the progress-bar.

        Parameters:
